alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 11:44AM EDT until June 19 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1044 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chipley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Cottondale, Alford, Steele City, Richter Crossroads, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Bahoma and Sunny Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
